item.title: Need help with NPC drop and Launcher for players
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

DestinationPKz:

Look, my problem is my server is done but people cant run the client beacause the “run” doesnt fit to all their java version. and I dont know where to change the drops of the npc’s. I cant change it in “NPCdrops” Please help me

omfg,
Step 1.)
Learn the basics of java ex: If statements, switch statements, int’s.
step 2.) Learn the basics of basics, learn how to tell when an error is caused by the jdk version and whatnot.
And areyou giving players all of the client files?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with NPC drop and Launcher for players
